-- Scryed --

Scryed nods to Talos, "I, uhh, my name is Scryed. Looks like I was 
in stasis for a lot longer that expected... things have changed. Now 
that I'm hear, I'd like to help you and your team out." She bows 
formally, and rises to wait for Talos' reply. She eyes Talos, 
getting a sense of the bot who seemed to be the leader of this 
Maximal team. He gave one a sense of confidence just looking at him, 
and perhaps, she thought, the inspiration to succeed.


> {Talos}
> 
>     Talos waited calmly for the bot in his office to answer as his 
comm came
> alive with reports. Turning from his guest he opened the comm to 
Blackfang,
> "I have a bot in my office but it seems like the day for guests, 
what's up?"
> he said before opening the comm to Condor, "Talos here Condor, 
what do you
> need, and speak up the comm signal seems to be weak..."
>
